code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import API from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewRooms=()=>{const[rooms,setRooms]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchRooms=async()=>{try{const res=await API.get('/rooms');setRooms(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchRooms();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center mt-8",children:"Loading rooms..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4",children:"All Rooms"}),rooms.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"No rooms added yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-5",children:rooms.map(room=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-4 rounded shadow border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"font-bold text-lg text-blue-700",children:["Room ",room.roomNo]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDC65 Capacity: ",room.capacity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u2744\uFE0F AC: ",room.hasAC?'Yes':'No']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDEBD Washroom: ",room.hasAttachedWashroom?'Yes':'No']})]},room._id))})]});};export default ViewRooms;
